Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:56:52
Folder: CNZZ0C0 - nominate now for the chalhoub excellence awards, tory burch re-opens dubai mall boutique, lacoste
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CNZZ0C0_00
From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-13 15:13
Subject: Nominate Now for the Chalhoub Excellence Awards, Tory Burch Re-Opens Dubai Mall Boutique, Lacoste Pop Up, Retail Academy Graduation Ceremony in Kuwait, BUXOM Cosmetics Takes Part in SEPHORiA & Internal Job Opportunities
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SaJR-KvcGk-ot8KiHrfoyw/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SaJR-KvcGk-ot8KiHrfoyw/544590/8663FB1882AB82303B6AB2E4DA6CC689/nuggets-05.png> 	

EXTENDED DEADLINE

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SaJR-KvcGk-ot8KiHrfoyw/550525/3AF3B0965BF3029B5782FDA1214A75F7/banner-43.png> 	

Nominations are now open to all team members until November 30th.


It's time to celebrateYOU! The Chalhoub Excellence Awards (CEA) is an opportunity to honor and recognise the remarkable achievements made by you and your teams across seven categories: Impactful Sustainability, Collaboration & Co-Creation, Customer Centricity, Servant Leadership, Entrepreneurial Spirit & Innovation, Excellence, and Diversity, Equity & Inclusion.

Ready to recognise the amazing work we’re doing?

chunks.text:
Ready to recognise the amazing work we’re doing? 

NOMINATE NOW

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SaJR-KvcGk-ot8KiHrfoyw/545358/36E5CDFD59371D18E463101677A5FD0C/nuggets-09.png> 	

TORY BURCH RE-OPENS BOUTIQUE IN DUBAI

Tory Burch re-opens its boutique at the Dubai Mall, following an extensive redesign of the space in keeping with the Tory Burch flagship in New York City. 

The boutique, the brand’s largest in the Middle East, features a wide assortment of shoes, handbags, ready-to-wear and accessories.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SaJR-KvcGk-ot8KiHrfoyw/550617/7B39A1DBFB46115469FDEBAC26D7B85F/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-50.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SaJR-KvcGk-ot8KiHrfoyw/545369/8978608E68E815545522D1E43E7FE8A0/nuggets-41.png> 	

LACOSTE POP UP AT ALSERKAL AVENUE

From Nov 14th to 16th, Lacoste are honoring the evolution of the women’s collection at The Yard, Alserkal Avenue. Dive into a range of activities that capture the spirit of Lacoste, with the Le Café Lacoste, Lacoste Tennis Court and a chance to enter a raffle for exciting prizes, including exclusive pieces from the 'Women’s Silhouette' collection!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SaJR-KvcGk-ot8KiHrfoyw/550615/F0386137864EBEB5CC96D9C22111FB0E/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-48.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SaJR-KvcGk-ot8KiHrfoyw/544530/ACE1E54DA99914ABB7A2D1B0DDFAC49B/nuggets-42.png> 	

RETAIL ACADEMY GRADUATION CEREMONY IN KUWAIT

chunks.text:
RETAIL ACADEMY GRADUATION CEREMONY IN KUWAIT

Last week, we hosted a graduation ceremony to recognise the dedication and achievements of our Store Consultants in Kuwait. With 118 Consultants successfully completing the CRVQ programme and 5 Store Leaders excelling in the L1 CAP programme, earning well-deserved promotions. Congrats to all our graduates!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SaJR-KvcGk-ot8KiHrfoyw/550616/A6E9D6F2193FAF0810EAA99F0B8BFE9C/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-49.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SaJR-KvcGk-ot8KiHrfoyw/545226/46513BE6DCD953E989DF25E192157455/nuggets-26.png> 	

BUXOM TAKES PART IN SEPHORIA 

BUXOM Cosmetics participated in the first-ever SEPHORiA event in the Middle East, bringing our signature “PICK YOUR PLUMP” theme to all lip plumping beauty lovers! 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SaJR-KvcGk-ot8KiHrfoyw/550618/9EAD4389C817EB22671A12B2936563A2/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-51.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SaJR-KvcGk-ot8KiHrfoyw/545300/33868F716A0B3E87D9F47D5BE64E95AC/nuggets-52.png> 	

OUR LATEST INTERNAL JOB OPPORTUNITIES

Here are the hot jobs for this week:

- EGY | Talent Acquisition Partner <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252feur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com%252f%253furl%253dhttps%25253A%25252F%25252Fcareers.chalhoubgroup.com%25252Fjobs%25252F5173401-talent-acquisition-partner-egypt%2526data%253d05%25257C02%25257CYasmine.Uthman%252540chalhoub.com%25257Cc8ff29f886ff4bf51cf808dd03a143e1%25257C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%25257C0%25257C0%25257C638670714130439563%25257CUnknown%25257CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%25253D%25253D%25257C0%25257C%25257C%25257C%2526sdata%253d%25252Fgp%25252FZ1chC9VgybXOC2RwzuL5n6CUt01i7AZ%25252F9foM16I%25253D%2526reserved%253d0%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWaS4SRulRJelt6AM%252frirOBeGMJPPk40oiaw9KZS7tBSPs0zqkqk40dZzApUTjcSsciYvV5m9niDLi9euYA1HPJyngIOOVjGdCBqsZeWcvwTLLFvF4X26QN1ipZuMbcotmUTuaOXRByANjwIpnR0qq31cn8RImx2RgAFerkE3ssxb%252bp0dzmAc9GvBr0hP2nYI3AVvR7c5gwJzlPrtn95j2r%252bYSxCX6DIfuOFGOggfU%252br9&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cb6b12b79abe4420c3a5808dd03d4271f%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638670931922228564%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=sMNI%2BTCRQRRRMg8nQ8b28ShVAbtE95hMWRCbpPBOf2Q%3D&reserved=0>
